cards.title: Nightmare Horde
setup: At the start of the game, {NightmareHorde} enters play “Shambling Fragments“ side up.
Reveal cards from the top of the villain deck until{BR}{H - 1} Fragments are revealed. Put the revealed{BR}Fragments into play, then shuffle the other revealed{BR}cards back into the villain deck.
gameplay: Whenever a Fragment is destroyed, {NightmareHorde} deals the hero target with the highest HP 2 Psychic damage.
When {NightmareHorde} would be destroyed, its villain character card flips to the “Ravenous Memories“ side instead.
At the start of the villain turn, {NightmareHorde} deals{BR}each non-villain target 1 Psychic damage.
flippedGameplay: When flipped to this side, {NightmareHorde}'s maximum HP is 60. {NightmareHorde} is set to 60 HP. Each hero either destroys one of their non-character cards or deals itself 2 irreducible Psychic damage.
Whenever a Fragment is destroyed, destroy a non-character hero card.
At the start of the villain turn, {NightmareHorde} deals each non-villain target 2 Psychic damage.
At the end of the villain turn, play the top card of the villain deck.

cards.title: Portrait Mimic
cards.body: At the end of the villain turn, each player may discard a card. If fewer than {H-1} cards are discarded this way, this card deals the hero target with the highest HP 3 Melee damage.

cards.title: Iron Titan
body: At the end of the villain turn, this card deals the hero target with the lowest HP and itself 2 Energy damage.

cards.title: Doppelmemory
body: When this card enters play, place it next to a hero without a Doppelmemory next to it.
The first time that hero deals a target damage each turn, this card deals that hero X Psychic damage, where X is the amount of damage dealt by that hero.
When that hero draws a card, play the top card of the villain deck.

cards.title: Brutish Shadow
body: The first time each turn this card is dealt damage, {NightmareHorde} regains 2 HP.
At the end of the villain turn, this card deals the hero with the most HP 2 irreducible Melee damage.

flavorQuotes.text: More are growing from the blood it spills?! This is insanity!

cards.title: Umbral Guardian
body: Increase damage dealt by other villain targets by 1.
Reduce damage dealt to other villain targets by 1.
The first time each turn this card would be dealt damage, prevent that damage.

cards.title: Bounding Centipede
body: After a hero target deals damage to a non-hero target, this card becomes immune to damage until the start of the next turn.
When this card is destroyed, play the top {H-2} cards of the villain deck.
At the end of the villain turn, this card deals the hero target with the highest HP 2 Melee damage.

cards.title: Nightmare Nuisances
body: The first time each turn each Fragment deals a non-villain target damage, {NightmareHorde} deals that target 1 irreducible Projectile damage.

cards.title: The Horde Marches On
body: Fragments are indestructible.
At the end of each turn, if there are {H-1} fragments in play at or below 0 HP, destroy this card.

cards.title: Flash Of Fear
body: Each player either discards two cards from their hand or that player's hero deals themselves 2 irreducible Psychic damage.

cards.title: Recombining Shadows
body: Shuffle the villain trash into the villain deck.

If there are fewer than {H} Fragments in play, reveal cards from the top of the villain deck until 1 Fragment is revealed, put it into play, then shuffle the other revealed cards back into the villain deck.
Each villain target regains 2 HP.

cards.title: Drawn To Feed
body: Each villain target deals the non-villain target with the lowest HP 1 Melee damage. Any target that deals damage this way regains 3 HP.
